summary: In the near future, Uffizi and Luke travel to the remote reaches of war torn Romania to rescue Elizabeth and finish the vampire once and for all. Along the way, they encounter TV news journalist and a corps of rebels trying to fight the vampire uprising which plagues their country.
cast: Jason Scott Lee|Stephen Billington|Diane Neal|Jason London|Rutger Hauer|Ilinca Goia|George Grigore|Roy Scheider|Tom Kane|Alexandra Wescourt|Serban Celea|Gavril Patru|Giuliano Doman|Valentin Popescu|Nicodim Ungureanu|Claudiu Bleont|Georgeta Marin|Domnita Constantiniu|Constantin Codrescu|Mircea Iulian Anca|Gary J. Tunnicliffe|Carmen Stimeriu|Cosmin Chiriac|Florin Porumb|Ioan Ionescu|Anne-Marie Caragea|Nicole Dutu|Ioana Ginghina
title: Dracula III: Legacy
